mapper.select: SELECT *, cast(date_part('day', (now()::timestamp - gmt_createtime::timestamp)) AS INTEGER) FROM hot WHERE st_contains(st_makeenvelope(${l_x},${l_y},${r_x},${r_y}, 4326), st_geomfromgeojson(st_asgeojson)) ORDER BY (1 + cast(read_amount as integer) + cast(comment_amount as integer) + cast(share_amount as integer) + cast(focus_amount as integer)) * cast(hot_level as integer) DESC
